thought: To craft cut_sandstone_slab, I need to craft cut_sandstone. Cut sandstone requires placing 4 sandstones in a square pattern in the crafting grid. Therefore, I will first place one sandstone in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 30 to slot 1 with quantity 1
